snippet: The news will bolster the Obama administration’s claims that the drone program led by the Central Intelligence Agency is successfully degrading Al Qaeda and its allies.
abstract: Major Uzbek militant group closely allied with Al Qaeda announces that its leader was killed in an American drone strike in Pakistan’s tribal belt, along the Afghan border; news will bolster the Obama administration’s claims that the drone program led by the CIA is successfully degrading Al Qaeda and its allies in Pakistan, despite strenuous Pakistani objections and continuing controversy over civilian casualties.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and ISMAIL KHAN
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from Islamabad, and Ismail Khan from Peshawar, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The news will bolster the Obama administration’s claims that the drone program led by the Central Intelligence Agency is successfully degrading Al Qaeda and its allies.

headline.seo: U.S. Drone Strike Kills Uzbek Militant Leader
headline.main: Uzbek Group Says Drone Killed Leader
headline.print_headline: Uzbek Group Says Drone Killed Leader

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
